channel.title: How Does Runescape handle quest text?
channel.description: I've always wondered this. When you work on a quest (This can be seen in Old School RS) the quest interface would update. First, it'd have the text on your current objective. And as you finished them, it would add a strike through and add then next part. How?

item.title: How Does Runescape handle quest text?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Arcik:

Why did you not just ask how to add a strike through text instead of asking how it’s done on RuneScape?

Cause they use just more than strike through’s.

Read full topic
item.source: How Does Runescape handle quest text?

item.title: How Does Runescape handle quest text?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:9, topic:515728”]https://code.google.com/p/rename317/source/browse/trunk/src/rs2/RSFont.java#279

if(s.equals("str")) isStrikethrough = true; if(s.equals("end")) isStrikethrough = false;
Not hard to look through the client and see how to do it… @str@ and @end@[/quote]
I was looking in my client for something like that because I saw a tutorial that did something like that. And mine had nothing similar.

Read full topic
item.source: How Does Runescape handle quest text?

item.title: How Does Runescape handle quest text?

@tyb97 wrote:

It’s a text formatting option that has to be enabled in the client first, google it. I’ve seen a few things about it.

Read full topic
item.source: How Does Runescape handle quest text?

item.title: How Does Runescape handle quest text?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:4, topic:515728”]Don’t listen to Arcik, she’s stupid.

It’s all saved in your account and when you click on the text it opens the same interface and changes all the text to what you’ve completed and such.[/quote]
Yeah I have an int for my quest atm. But I can’t seem to figure out how to make strike through text.

Read full topic
item.source: How Does Runescape handle quest text?

Some people might. I mean, it’s worth a shot in asking.
